official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income reduced airline fare benefits received by airline employees and their families.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income reduced airline fare benefits received by airline employees and their families.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income reduced airline fare benefits received by airline employees and their families.
